title: [1.10.2~1.8.9][个人汉化][Slurpie's Dongles  更多物品]丰富你的生存之旅
author: x794815255
txt_content:
一如既往废话这个MOD实在不知道怎么起名字 就用更多物品代替


然后 作者也说了 我就搬运了
You are free to use my mod in your modpack, public or private. I do ask that you do NOT make money off of this mod whether it be ads, or selling this mod as your own. Please link the mod link somewhere in your pack back to here, and give credit to RedBullSlurpie for creating the mod. It would also be nice if you would let me know in the comments if you are using my mod in your pack, as i would like to check the pack out, but is not required to do so. Enjoy. 


接下来是 物品总览
英文慎入
New as of update 3.0.8 or 4/18/2016
Nether Ores added into modNether Coal OreNether Diamond OreNether Emerald OreNether Gold OreNether Iron OreNether Lapis OreNether Redstone Ore
New FoodsBlack CoffeeCoffee 
What my mod addsBlocks:Blue GlowstoneGray GlowstoneGreen GlowstoneOrange GlowstonePink GlowstonePurple GlowstoneRed GlowstoneSapphire BlockSapphire OreRuby BlockRuby OreTopaz BlockTopaz OreReinforced Obsidian Items:Blue Glowstone DustGray Glowstone DustGreen Glowstone DustOrange Glowstone DustPink Glowstone DustPurple Glowstone DustRed Glowstone DustBlenderKnifeTopaz HandleTime Staff(Only in the 1.9 version, will fast forward time when right clicked in your hand. Day to Night, and Night to Day.)SapphireRubyTopazPop's Sign(A special sign I made for my grandfather who passed away, this item will most likely have no use to you unless you want to hang it somewhere like me.)Food:Apple JuiceCarrot JuiceMelon JuiceMelon SlushiePumpkin JuiceRoasted AppleToastArmor:Sapphire Helmet(Wearing this item gives permanent Night Vision)Sapphire ChestplateSapphire LeggingsSapphire BootsRuby Helmet(Wearing this item gives permanent Night Vision)Ruby ChestplateRuby Leggings(Wearing this item gives permanent Swiftness)Ruby BootsTopaz Helmet (Unbreakable)(Wearing this item gives permanent Night Vision)Topaz Chestplate (Unbreakable)(Wearing this item gives permanent Fire Resistance)Topaz Leggings (Unbreakable)(Wearing this item give permanent Swiftness)Topaz Boots (Unbreakable)Wearing the full set of Topaz Armor gives flight, as if you we're in creative mode. :)Tools: Sapphire AxeSapphire HoeSapphire PickaxeSapphire ShovelSapphire SwordRuby AxeRuby HoeRuby PickaxeRuby ShovelRuby SwordTopaz Axe  (Unbreakable)Topaz Hoe (Unbreakable)Topaz Pickaxe (Unbreakable)Topaz Shovel (Unbreakable)Topaz Sword (Unbreakable) 

这是我的介绍本mod加入了新方块（废话） 新矿石 工具 还有食物 作物

蓝玉 红宝石 和黄玉
他们都比钻石好 并且黄玉工具是无限使用的（但是很贵）
然后BUFF
蓝玉头盔夜视 
红宝石 夜视 速度 
黄玉 夜视 速度 防火（好像还可以飞）
一个黄玉复合工具 还是耐久无限 但是死贵的
添加了地狱矿石 
还有各类颜色的砖块 还有萤石 （这里忘记截图了）

新作物 橘子 柠檬 玉米 一格饱食
都可以直接食用 玉米种子打草 柠檬橘子要找到柠檬橘子丛才可以获得


又添加工具 小刀 榨汁机
 
使用次数没有测试 但应该是无限
可以把熟鸡肉 生牛肉猪肉切成丁==
数量当然不是1：1
 榨汁机可以做果汁
回复一格饱食 
所有作物 土豆小麦除外 都可以榨汁 另外
柠檬还可以做冰（然并卵）
这里面还有一个时间权杖 我不怎么会用 
一个装饰的item
我也不知道有什么用
这就是全部介绍了 



最后 最重要的别忘记给一点人气

replies.author: pylsdani
replies.txt_content: 只是添加一些东西，但并没人吸引人的地方~

replies.author: Gonz0o11
replies.txt_content:
pylsdani 发表于 2016-8-6 12:18
只是添加一些东西，但并没人吸引人的地方~
或許是介紹太簡單，導致看起來沒有吸引力吧

replies.txt_content: 不如直译吧，很多mod直译出名的，也很有趣比如因式分解233“思乐冰的加密狗”——谷歌翻译

replies.txt_content:

你还更新吗？

replies.author: 麦米库
replies.txt_content: 看起来蛮简单的，一个小模组。
